group_1.textRight: We're going on a trip soon. Did you get your@swimsuit ready?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes... I bought it with my mom...

group_1.textRight: Oh, with your mother? Isn't that nice?

group_1.textLeft: Not really...

group_1.textRight: What? You're so shy, just try it on for a second.
...Oh, but of course...there's no way you@brought your swimsuit here.

group_1.textLeft: No, I brought it. I carried it around...

group_1.textRight: You must really like it!

group_1.textLeft: Whether I do or not, I'm still embarrassed@to wear it...

group_1.textRight: If you're embarrassed here, you'll be even@more embarrassed at the beach, you know?
There'll be so many people!

group_1.textLeft: ...Everyone wears swimsuits at the beach.
But if I'm the only one in a swimsuit while@you're wearing clothes...
I can't... it's too embarrassing...

group_1.textRight: In that case, you won't complain if I wear a@swimsuit too, right?

group_1.textLeft: What...?
(I've lost the argument...)

group_1.narration: Nemu? Are you ready? Then, let’s do it!

group_1.textRight: Ta-da!

group_1.textLeft: I-I'm not so sure about this...
You seem like a very ladylike girl... And yet,@I’m...

group_1.textRight: You're so cute!

group_1.textLeft: Is that what you really think?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! And it looks really good on you!
Your mother really knows her stuff!

group_1.textLeft: Well, she does this sort of thing for a living.

group_1.textRight: If you'd just chosen it yourself, it wouldn't@have turned out so good.

group_1.textLeft: I can't just overlook that... You think I@have no taste...?
That's just rude.
I made the final decision, so it's not like@I don't have any sense...

group_1.textRight: What about that hat?

group_1.textLeft: My mom...said it was to protect me from@heat stroke and sunburn.

group_1.textRight: And the hoodie?

group_1.textLeft: My mom...said it's better than wearing only a@swimsuit, because I’d get cold...

group_1.textRight: I guess your mother knows you better than@yourself.

group_1.textLeft: Guh...

group_1.textRight: Now, aren't you going to get changed?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes.
(But there's a big mirror...)
*Chuckle*
*Chuckle*

group_1.textRight: Hey, hurry up and get dressed.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101450:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Touka?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It looks like you're having fun.

group_1.textLeft: ...?![wait:1.0][chara:101450:motion_0][chara:101450:lipSynch_1] Th-that’s not true...
You know, it wouldn't look good if we were@standing still for the souvenir photo.

group_1.textRight: You're having so much fun that you're worried@about how you're going to look in the photo!

group_1.textLeft: ...Kuh, letting you read my heart is the@greatest failure of my life.

group_1.textRight: Nyaaah! You’re making fun of me!

group_1.textLeft: Well, all right...it's not like I can fool you.
Can you stop laughing and listen?

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* I'm not laughing at you!

group_1.textLeft: I'm embarrassed to admit that I'm@uncharacteristically giddy.

group_1.textRight: Do you love the ocean?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know...but probably not. I've never@longed for the sea.
This elation I'm feeling right now is nothing@like that.
It's the realization that I can do something@that I've never been able to do before.
That realization is making my heart and body@flutter...

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* You sound a bit like an athlete.
Come to think of it, your family is very athletic.
I wonder if you really are...

group_1.textLeft: Well...if I had been born in a healthy body...
I might have been an athlete, as well...@It's a life that could have been.
And now, I've got the body that could have been.
The mission as Magius is important, but...
That's just the beginning.
Just as important to me, I want to use this@body to experience the wide world.
With this body and these legs, I'm going to@travel to various places.
I’ll run about all kinds of places.

group_1.textRight: And the ocean is the first step, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes!
